subtopics.name: Counting
learning_objectives: Understand the concept of counting as a foundational skill for multiplication
instructional_activities: Use number charts to reinforce counting patterns
assessment_methods: Observe student ability to count objects correctly

subtopics.name: Repetitive Addition
learning_objectives: Understand that multiplication is repeated addition
instructional_activities: Use counters to demonstrate adding groups of the same number
Practice adding the same number multiple times on worksheets
assessment_methods: Observation of student ability to group numbers

subtopics.name: Multiplying Single-Digit Numbers
learning_objectives: Memorize multiplication facts for numbers 1 through 10
instructional_activities: Use flashcards to reinforce multiplication facts

subtopics.name: Multiplying Two-Digit Numbers
learning_objectives: Learn the process for multiplying two-digit numbers
Apply single-digit multiplication skills to larger numbers
instructional_activities: Practice two-digit multiplication with grid paper
